See My Resume

About Me

Hello there! I'm Nishant, a front-end developer with a strong interest who is just getting started on the fascinating field of web development. My area of expertise is creating aesthetically beautiful and intuitive interfaces with HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS and basic JavaScript. I work hard to create websites that look amazing and give visitors a smooth experience. I have a sharp eye for design and I adore clean, efficient code. I'm now learning more JavaScript in order to broaden my skill set and realize the full potential of dynamic and interactive web applications. I'm excited to continue learning new technologies and keeping up with front-end development trends. I'm eager to collaborate, grow, and contribute to the ever-evolving world of web development. Let's build something amazing projects together!
